thread.title: A Clever Dad Found a VERY Cool Way To Entertain His Triplets While He Mows the Lawn
thread.title_full: A Clever Dad Found a VERY Cool Way To Entertain His Triplets While He Mows the Lawn

author: Mandy Kennedy
title: A Clever Dad Found a VERY Cool Way To Entertain His Triplets While He Mows the Lawn
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 224 Shares It's hard enough to keep one kid entertained when that's your only focus. So what happens when you're the dad of triplets and still have to get your chores done? 
Well, if you’re this resourceful and handy dad, you kill two birds with one stone by turning your errands into your kids’ playtime. 
See how he did it using this a broken-down plastic stroller and a great imagination. As you can see, the used item he bought lacked a lot of important features like, uh, wheels and seat belts. via: The Chive 
But he did get a good deal on it! As you can see, this thing sells for $1,100 new, so let's hope he got a big discount considering the state he bought it in.
